QuestData.Title: Assault on Dreadmaul Rock
QuestData.Description: This is it, $n. This is where it hits the fan. Where all the pieces come together.$b$bStrap in, and come with me. We're going to go talk to Acride and call in that favor that he owes us. Then we'll stop this invasion of Redridge before it even starts.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay 200 Blackrock Invaders. If you should lose your vehicle, use the Horn of the Callers to summon it again.
QuestData.RewardText: Did you see them run? They didn't know what was happening! Beautiful!$b$bOur job's almost done, $n. It's time to deliver the deathblow.
